member.name: P:MMG.PlasticExtensions.YouTrackPlugin.IYouTrackExtensionConfigFacade.IgnoreIssueStateForBranchTitle
member.summary: Issue state(s) to not display in branch title when ShowIssueStateInBranchTitle = true.
member.remarks: Use commas to separate multiple states.

member.name: M:MMG.PlasticExtensions.YouTrackPlugin.YouTrackService.applyUserMapping(System.String)
member.summary: This method will take the mapping setting and allow mapping different authentication methods' usernames to issue username.
member.param: The username specified for configuration value UserId
member.returns: the username to pass to youtrack to filter for issues assignee.
